title: RP Cards? 40$
body: So I give 40$ to a friend to buy RP for me and what he did was buy them for himself? what do I do? He gives me the wrong code? I told him to give me the RP cards when we get back to school and the next day! He tells me that it's at home? What a great friend he was, not going to be friends with him anymore, he owns me 40$ worth of RP!

replies.body: Purchase RP yourself in the future, don't rely on others to fulfil monetary favours for you.
Tell his parents then he wont have fun anymore.
